resources.string: Green color for normal or safe rates
Red color for danger or high rates
After reviewing your entered data it became clear to us that you are infected with :

Early diabetes :
You are on your way to have diabetes. As your rate of blood glucose (A1C) was in between the range 105 – 126 and this indicates your stage, You are in your early stages so don\'t worry.
Symptoms of diabetes may include :
Feeling more thirsty than usual.
frequent urination.
Unintentional weight loss.
One of the proposed solutions is to maintain a healthy diet and do sports exercise continuously, in addition to getting rid of excess weight. you can call for help whether it is from our technical and doctors support or from your private doctor.
doctor : +201015301454
Technical Support : +201008215941

Diabetes :
You have diabetes. As your rate of blood glucose (A1C) was above the range 126 and this indicates your stage.
Symptoms of diabetes may include:
Feeling more thirsty than usual.
frequent urination.
Unintentional weight loss.
One of the proposed solutions is to maintain a healthy diet and do sports exercise continuously, in addition to getting rid of excess weight. you can call for help whether it is from our technical and doctors support or from your private doctor.
doctor : +201062825233
Technical Support : +201120572250

Hypoglycemia :
You have Hypoglycemia that occurs when the level of sugar (glucose) in the blood drops too low for body functions to continue to function. There are many reasons why this might happen. The most common cause of low blood sugar is a side effect of medications used to treat diabetes. As your rate of blood glucose (A1C) was under the value of 70 and this indicates your stage.
Symptoms of lake of glucose may include:
paleness
Shivering
sweating
Headache
hunger
or nausea.
you can call for help whether it is from our technical and doctors support or from your private doctor.
doctor : +201273481309
Technical Support : +201558231869

Anemia :
You have Anemia that is a condition in which the blood does not contain enough healthy red blood cells to carry enough oxygen to the body\'s tissues.
Anemia, also known as a low hemoglobin level, can make you feel tired and weak, As you have a low rate of hemoglobin and a low number of Red blood cells.
So this indicates your stage. Many types of anemia can be prevented. But you can avoid iron deficiency anemia and vitamin deficiency anemia by eating a diet that contains many vitamins and minerals.
Don\'t worry, you can call for help whether it is from our technical and doctors support or from your private doctor.
doctor : +201014978243
Technical Support : +201091320598

Dehydration :
You have dehydration which occurs as a result of abnormal water loss from the body and this led to increase in hematocrit rates .
that is why your hematocrit rate that is why your hematocrit rate is greater than 45%.
Symptoms of dehydration may include:
feeling thirsty and lightheaded
a dry mouth
tiredness
having dark coloured, strong-smelling urine
passing urine less often than usual.
One of the proposed solutions is to Drink plenty of water and avoid areas where the temperature or humidity is high.
you can call for help whether it is from our technical and doctors support or from your private doctor.
doctor : +201507676713
Technical Support : +201092562750

HIV/AIDS :
You have aids which caused by the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) this led to decrease in WBC (White Blood Cell Count) . this is why your wbc count is less than 4500 .
Symptoms of dehydration may include:
Fever
Headache
Rash
Diarrhea
Weight loss
Cough
Night sweats.
Although there is no cure for acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS) , there is some solutions one of them is AIDS medications and Nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors (NRTI).
you can call for help whether it is from our technical and doctors support or from your private doctor.
doctor : +201091533827
Technical Support : +201226552360
